name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - T | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three or more clues. For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid". You must come up with these answers. The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word. In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink". I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink".  Each answer in this quiz will begin with the letter T.  Good luck!

Movie house (American) - Device emitting hot air - One who consumes
Dull noise - Camel's lump - Baseball referee
Follow - Bar of wood or metal - To be ill

Time for a question with four clues!

Refuse - Skin irritation - Cinders - Quiet
Walk heavily - Sloped surface - Quantity of electrical flow

This one is a bit more obscure!

Talked silly - Walked like a duck - Rotten
Sudden jerk - Female wizard - Tickling sensation
Thick cloth woven in diagonal lines - Wish - Sick
